content:
I’m a cancer biologist with a research background in cancer epigenetics. During my time in the lab, I’ve enjoyed applying my diverse technical skill set to research problems and implementing new methods.
I participated in the Insight Health Data Science Program in Boston, where I built an app that uses machine learning to help doctors predict patient medication adherence! Check it out in my portfolio site (showcase link at the top of the page)! When Iâ€™m not at the bench or buried in a Python project, I enjoy cooking, traveling, and indoor gardening.
Thanks for visiting!
Updated Apr. 23rd, 2023

title: Kelly McGlynn
